data.title: University of Florida, Institute of Food and Agricultural Sciences
meta_keywords: UF/IFAS Extension Taylor County - Institute of Food and Agricultural Sciences
data.meta_description: UF/IFAS Extension Taylor County - From learning principles of proper nutrition to growing profitable crops - from helping youth develop leadership skills and self esteem to creating artificial reefs - Taylor County's Extension Service offers a wealth of practical information for the citizens of our county.
data.text:
Taylor County 4-H club and volunteer information

4-H clubs

The 2021-22 club year is off to a great start with record attendance in all clubs. Let's Keep the trend going!

Below are links to all current Taylor county clubs. If you want to enroll you can click Enroll at 4-H Online. Remember you have to re-enroll every year.

Clubs

Culinary club

Sharpshooters club

Sewing club

Cloverbud club

Renegades club

Chick chain club

Livestock club

Fee

4-H state headquarters implemented a fee to be enrolled in 4-H community clubs. The funds will be used to enhance 4-H programming at the state and local levels. The fee is $20.00 per youth/year. This fee can be paid online when you re-enroll your child or by check made payable to the University of Florida. Once your child's enrollment fee is paid, they will be confirmed as a 4-H club member.

Cloverbud ages 5-7, are not required to pay a fee.

Your child can ride bus will be updated soon

Please contact Abbey Tharpe at the Taylor county extension office (850)838-3508 if you are having trouble enrolling.

4-H volunteer

Volunteer today, inspire for a lifetime.

Join 4-H today and help lead clubs for youth on their 4-H journey.

Whether in the arts or technology, shooting sports, houses, business, or government Taylor county 4-H needs your help to provide opportunities in which local children can learn and grow.

No matter your experience, or the amount of time you have to give, there is a place for you!

For more information call Abbey Tharpe at the Taylor county extension office (850)838-3508.

Connect
